name: Slack
description: A quick connection to Slack using the Events API.

signingSecret.description: Unique string provided by Slack to verify requests

botAccessToken.description: Token provided by Slack when you created your bot

outgoingMessages.displayName: Sent responses as soon as they arrive (Multiple responses):
outgoingMessages.description: In case you are using multi action recognition you can enable this setting to send the messages as soon as they arrive instead of waiting for the response to be compiled.

waitTimeBetweenMessages.displayName: Time in MS between response messages:
waitTimeBetweenMessages.description: How much the channel should wait between agent responses?
